mapper.sql: ID, USER_ID, GROUP_ID, TYPE, PRIORITY, REPOS_ID, IS_ADMIN, ACCESS, EDIT_EN, ADD_EN, DELETE_EN, DOWNLOAD_EN, HERITABLE
mapper.insert: insert into repos_auth (ID, USER_ID, GROUP_ID, TYPE, PRIORITY, REPOS_ID, IS_ADMIN, ACCESS, EDIT_EN, ADD_EN, DELETE_EN, DOWNLOAD_EN, HERITABLE) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reposId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isAdmin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{access,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{editEn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addEn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleteEn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{downloadEn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{heritable,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update repos_auth
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REPOS_ID = #{reposId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_ADMIN = #{isAdmin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ACCESS = #{access,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EDIT_EN = #{editEn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ADD_EN = #{addEn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DELETE_EN = #{deleteEn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DOWNLOAD_EN = #{downloadEn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HERITABLE = #{heritable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update repos_auth set USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REPOS_ID = #{reposId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_ADMIN = #{isAdmin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ACCESS = #{access,jdbcType=INTEGER}, EDIT_EN = #{editEn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ADD_EN = #{addEn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DELETE_EN = #{deleteEn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DOWNLOAD_EN = #{downloadEn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HERITABLE = #{heritable,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user.ID as userId,user.NAME as userName,user.REAL_NAME as realName, repos_auth.ID as id, REPOS_ID, IS_ADMIN, ACCESS, EDIT_EN, ADD_EN, DELETE_EN, DOWNLOAD_EN, HERITABLE from user LEFT JOIN repos_auth ON user.ID = repos_auth.USER_ID and repos_auth.REPOS_ID = #{reposId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select user_group.ID as groupId,user_group.NAME as groupName, repos_auth.ID as id, REPOS_ID, IS_ADMIN, ACCESS, EDIT_EN, ADD_EN, DELETE_EN, DOWNLOAD_EN, HERITABLE from user_group LEFT JOIN repos_auth ON user_group.ID = repos_auth.GROUP_ID and repos_auth.REPOS_ID = #{reposId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from repos_auth where 1=1
and REPOS_ID = #{reposId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and (USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} or USER_ID = 0 or GROUP_ID IN (select GROUP_ID from group_member where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}))

select
from repos_auth where 1=1
and REPOS_ID = #{reposId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and (GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER} or USER_ID = 0)

select
from repos_auth where 1=1
and REPOS_ID = #{reposId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and USER_ID = 0
